issue_title: [Bug] next_id() 会返回已存在的 ID（ID 碰撞），当 JSON 文件中存在非连续或已删除的 ID 时
fix_summary: Added defensive ID collision check in next_id() method using a while loop to ensure the returned ID is unique
risks: Minor performance impact for very large todo lists due to set creation and potential while loop iterations (negligible for typical use cases)
limitations: Does not fill gaps in ID sequences - always uses max+1 approach
